title: Silver 3 looking for a team. Serious about making a competitive semi-pro team
body:
Hi all

I'm currently ranked silver 3 and I'm looking for a ranked team to play with. I'm serious about developing my playstyle and my mechanics and I want to be apart of a ranked team to one day (hopefully) be semi-pro or at least highly ranked as a team.

Any help would be much appreciated and I'm willing to learn and listen to constructive critisism.

Facebook: Karl Davis (captain america)
Instagram: karlospicyweiner

Contact me with any serious offers/inquiries please :)

replies.body: ayo, im keen to jam with you. im usually on after 3pm on weekdays cause i work from 5am-2pm. i play anywhere besides bot lane(used to play adc and support season 2-3 but got over 4 man ganks). i used to be on a team and we would do xfire comps but didnt get far because the team i was on kept changing roles. hit me up in game if you wanna talk more bro. IGN : TR45H
